message: Let's start fair, I'll take a larger share this time, but I'm open to negotiation in the future!
Take it or leave it, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's find a split that's fair to both of us.  We only have a few rounds left before we risk losing everything.
You're getting desperate, so I'm taking a firmer stance. This is my best and final offer!
We're both losing money with every round. Let's cut our losses and agree to a deal that's fair enough for both of us. I can't afford to keep rejecting your offers.
